Sending love and solidarity ❤️

text: RT @AaronBell4NUL: Judging by social media it’s another appalling evening of odour - reports from Knutton, Milehouse, Wolstanton, Basford,…

@AaronBell4NUL @EnvAgency I assume you’ve seen the letter circulating social media from a paediatrician confirming the landfill gases are affecting a little boy called Matthew. 👇. This is serious, more and more people are coming forward with symptoms. This is a health crisis. #stopthestink https://t.co/6RCRCKpGJF

@StinkStopthe @AaronBell4NUL @EnvAgency How many more years do you expect your constituents to put up with this? You were with the @EnvAgency on Thursday, we expect you to be putting a lot more pressure on them, you wanted to represent this town, we need strong leadership not pussyfooting around. 6/10 must try harder.

@fayedavies @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 You too. I know we all feel utterly desperate but knowing we support one another is the knowledge I try to hold on to whenever I feel hopeless. I hope you can get some sleep tonight. Sending love and solidarity.

entity.name: Countryfile
entity.description: Stories are shared of the people, places and issues at the heart of the British countryside. Popular features include the programme's photography contest, which culminates in a yearly calendar sold to benefit charity, the Video Diary, produced by viewers and focused on life in rural areas, and the weather forecasts.

domain.name: TV Shows
domain.description: Television shows from around the world

entity.name: Countryfile Diaries
entity.description: A sister show to the BBC's `Countryfile' series, this rural affairs programme sees a team of presenters travel the length and breadth of the United Kingdom to cover stories related to the British countryside and the season of spring. As this period is a busy time of the year for the farming and outdoor communities in particular, regular topics covered include the production of food, nature conservation, and a look at a chosen area's culture and history. Stunning landscapes and a variety of wildlife also feature prominently.
